name: Gift Digger Deluxe
description:
Dig up gifts for the door guardians, try to give them what they like or dislike.

There are a few bugs involving returning to the start after completing the game among other things, sorry! (also it's supposed to be mongoose or mongoos_ on the start application image) The item interaction hitbox can be tricky to get used to, the item should be just below the hand of the direction you are facing.
